featured.text: It is the only one of the whole group that 24 the French Revolution, while the rest were melted down for weapons.

other.text: He participated in three revolutions and fought with people when he was insulted.

definition.zh_def: 革命；徹底的變革或轉變。
definition.en_def: A forcible overthrow of a government or social order in favor of a new system.
definition.example: The revolution led to significant changes in the country's political landscape.
